body: You what I will tell you the story of Ice Dagger. It's about this man named Rolind Fitzgerald in a world that sorta resembles earth. He has dwarf son named Peter and a loving wife called Katelyn. But something is missing but what there is a frustation in his life a feeling of malice he has insecurities about his son and fears that his wife cheats on him. But he never ever touches his family instead he starts going on country drives to kill underprivileged people. Most of the kills are quick but sometimes he likes to play games with his co workers. They may called eye gouging, rape, mouth rape, jumping on stomachs and stuff like that. Id like to focus on the gory details may be you could help me?
PS your story is great. You should make some sort of creepypasta channel. I could really use your guro knowledge in Ice Dagger.

finally found someone as fucked as me and who admits it and has no problem with it. You are friend to me. Stuff like I feel you are a lot like a certain character I have been thinking about in a book about a Serial killer(its okay you arnt the killer, it's me at least a mirror image of me) currently titled 'Ice Dagger'. My methods included drowning, burning, burying, limb cutting, crushing, and all those again in one go. But after all this I would just kill the 7th becoz why not. I felt good taking his hope.
